imdb.plot outline: It is an original audiovisual creation that plunges the viewer into a new and intriguing technological universe. The action takes place over twelve episodes lasting between 8 and 12 minutes each. Salim, played by Momo, featured radio host, is a young mobile network maintenance technician. His life takes a totally unexpected course when, in the aftermath of an accident, he wakes up with "hyper reality" powers. He then discovered extraordinary faculties of audio and video communication, interactions with connected objects, applications, video games and messaging tools. He finds himself immersed in a world of augmented reality. To learn how to tame and tame his new powers, Salim can count on the precious help of his fiancee Dounia, played by the talented Zineb Obeid, and his uncle Shielded Bush, camped by Adnane Mouhejja. "Rezo is a high-quality series, with a breathtaking scenario and endearing and true actors. It's also a series with a purpose and meaning. It raises the question of the technological whole. The great potential of a connected world and the advances that it allows. As a global telecom operator, committed to an Internet for all vision, it is our responsibility to approach these types of themes in an entertaining and fun setting, "explains Brahim Amdouy Content Manager at inwi. Rezo is the fourth series produced by inwi. It is simultaneously broadcast on the Internet and on the TV channel 2M throughout the month of Ramadan.
